A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was the movie visually stunning...absolutely\, but I left the theater kind of empty as I felt like they killed Luke in more ways than one. I feel like this is no longer the Skywalker family saga as it was meant to me.  Just disappointed. That's the word I think of the most. I'm not angry\, but disappointed at what I feel was a wasted opportunity. I get wanting to establish the new cast\, but you don't have to take a dump on the former to get it done.  Will be really interesting to see how JJ handles IX. Think a lot of newer/younger fans will like this more than those that grew up on the OT.
